attributes.action: For all healthcare professionals to have free parking while on duty.
attributes.additional_details: believe that health care professionals are doing a wonderful job to deliver care to patients daily especially with the community sector, however parking as become a very difficult task making it extremely difficult for healthcare care workers to deliver care in a timely manner due to not having enough or no free parking. I would like the government to change or create a law that provides free parking for all healthcare workers with the U.K..
attributes.background: I would like for the government to provide free parking For all healthcare professionals to have free parking while working at all times in all areas across the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about parking charges are a matter for car park operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free parking for all staff at NHS hospitals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631196
